## WorkflowService.reAssignActivity() method

Reassigns a Workflow Activity to another User or Group. This operation returns an instance of 'ActivityInstance' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static reAssignActivity({ escapedActivityInstanceId, newAssigneeId, }: {
        escapedActivityInstanceId: string;
        newAssigneeId: string;
    }): CancelablePromise<ActivityInstance>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter                                     | Type                                                          | Description |
| --------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| { escapedActivityInstanceId, newAssigneeId, } | { escapedActivityInstanceId: string; newAssigneeId: string; } |             |

**Returns:**

[CancelablePromise](./open-api-client.cancelablepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;[ActivityInstance](./open-api-client.activityinstance.md)<!-- -->&gt;

ActivityInstance The request was successful.
